[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/nft-metadata-crawler/src/asset_uploader/throttler/config.rs] [Derive: Serialize] [Config Exposure] When AssetUploaderThrottlerConfig is serialized (e.g., for monitoring/debugging), are sensitive Cloudflare credentials inadvertently exposed in API responses, metrics, or health check endpoints? [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/nft-metadata-crawler/src/asset_uploader/throttler/config.rs] [Function: default_poll_interval_seconds] [Timing Attack] Is the 10-second default poll interval predictable enough for attackers to time database state changes and exploit race conditions in the asset upload queue?
